Name: IDA Pro
Description: IDA Pro is an interactive disassembler and debugger, providing comprehensive features for reverse engineering software.
HTU: Install IDA Pro, load the target binary, and use the disassembler and debugger to analyze the code.

Name: Ghidra
Description: Ghidra is a free and open-source software reverse engineering suite developed by the NSA, offering disassembly and decompilation capabilities.
HTU: Install Ghidra, create a new project, load the target binary, and use the tools for analysis.

Name: Radare2
Description: Radare2 is an open-source framework for reverse engineering and analyzing binaries, which includes a debugger and many other tools.
HTU: Install Radare2, load the target binary, and use the commands to analyze and develop exploits.

Name: OllyDbg
Description: OllyDbg is an x86 debugger that emphasizes binary code analysis and is useful for reverse engineering and debugging.
HTU: Install OllyDbg, load the target executable, and use the debugger to analyze the program's behavior.

Name: Capstone
Description: Capstone is a lightweight multi-architecture disassembly framework.
HTU: Install Capstone, integrate it with your reverse engineering tools, and use the API to disassemble binaries.
